title: Atletico Madrid 'ready to battle Manchester United and Juventus for signature of PSG striker Cavani'
text:
Atletico Madrid have joined the race to sign Paris Saint-Germain star Edinson Cavani, according to reports in France.

Calciomercato are citing a report in L'Equipe that Atleti are interested in the 32-year-old Uruguayan. who has been linked with Manchester United and Italian clubs Inter, Napoli and Juventus.

Cavani’s contract at PSG expires next summer and the striker, who has scored 195 goals during his seven seasons, could move on a free transfer.

Paris Saint-Germain striker Edinson Cavani has not played since August due to a hip injury

He has scored 195 goals during his seven seasons in the French capital.

PSG boss Thomas Tuchel wants Cavani to stay at the club.

He said: 'I don't know Edi's ideas exactly at the moment. I count 100 per cent on Edi this season. He's been missing for several weeks and the main thing for me is to push Edi on the pitch, so we've got a fit and in-form Edinson Cavani.

'He's got the most goals for the club. Edi is very important,' Tuchel continued.
description: Atletico Madrid have joined the race to sign Paris Saint-Germain star Edinson Cavani, according to reports in France. The 32-year-old's contract at PSG expires next summer.
